sentences.en: a hotel on Fifth Avenue
sentences.cn: 第五大街上的一家旅馆

sentences.en: a tree-lined avenue
sentences.cn: 林荫道

sentences.en: an avenue of limes
sentences.cn: 两边栽有欧椴树的林荫道

sentences.en: an avenue of stately chestnut trees
sentences.cn: 两边有雄伟高大栗树的林荫道

sentences.en: Back on Flatbush Avenue, Pong is busy restocking his shelves with cucumbers and coconuts.
sentences.cn: 回到弗拉特布什大道上，庞正忙着往货架上补充黄瓜和椰子。

sentences.en: Bergdorf Goodman has opened a men's store on Fifth Avenue.
sentences.cn: 波道夫·古德曼在第五大道上开了一家男装店。

sentences.en: Fifth Avenue
sentences.cn: 第五大街

sentences.en: He drove slowly. The avenue was crowded with people.
sentences.cn: 他慢慢地开车, 因为大街上挤满了人.

sentences.en: He dug a hole in our yard on Edgerton Avenue to plant a maple tree when I was born.
sentences.cn: 我出生的时候，他在埃杰顿大街我们家的园圃里挖了个坑，种了棵枫树。

sentences.en: He is staying at Seaview Hotel, Princes'Avenue, Briton.
sentences.cn: 他住在不列顿市王子街的海景旅馆里.

sentences.en: He knew how the traffic congested at the junction of Seventh Avenue and Forty - second Street.
sentences.cn: 他知道在第7街和第42街交叉处交通是多么拥挤.

sentences.en: It is a first for New York. An outdoor exhibition of Fernando Botero's sculpture on Park Avenue.
sentences.cn: 在公园大道上露天展出费尔南多·博特罗的雕塑，这在纽约还是破天荒的事。

sentences.en: Lily lives in a penthouse just off Park Avenue.
sentences.cn: 莉莉住在公园大道附近的一套顶层豪华公寓里。

sentences.en: Shaftesbury Avenue
sentences.cn: 沙夫茨伯里街

sentences.en: The president wants to explore every avenue towards peace in the region.
sentences.cn: 总统想探索一切途径实现该地区的和平。

sentences.en: The traffic along Fitzjohn's Avenue was heavy.
sentences.cn: 菲茨姜大道上的交通拥堵严重。

sentences.en: There are many avenues open to researchers.
sentences.cn: 研究人员有许多途径可供选择。

sentences.en: They have broadened out the avenue considerably.
sentences.cn: 他们把这条马路加宽了不少.

sentences.en: This is a shady avenue.
sentences.cn: 这是条林阴大道.

sentences.en: We went Dutch on a meal in the new restaurant in Shaftesbury Avenue.
sentences.cn: 我们在沙夫茨伯里大道一家新开的饭馆里AA制吃的饭。

phrases.tran_cn: 美国广告业；美国广告业作风；麦德逊大道（美国广告业中心）
派克大街（美国纽约市的豪华大街街名，意译为公园大道或林荫大道）；林荫大道（别克汽车的旗舰品牌）
宾夕法尼亚大道（在美国首都华盛顿）

trans.tran_en: used in the names of streets in a town or city
